name: Fofonso's AtomsVGA
description:
Back in 2018 I made a game based on an ancient shareware game called Atoms for Win 3.11, the original was made by a guy called Mike McNamee and it was really fun!

So I tried my hand in re-making (de-making it?) for DOS and VGA.

This is what came out of it!

Please keep in mind that this is a DOS game, so you'll need Dos-Box (https://dosbox-staging.github.io/) in order to play it (Or an actual DOS computer! Should run on 486s and later just fine)

The source code (GPLv3) can be found at https://github.com/affonsoamendola/atomsVGA, I used Turbo C++ v3 to compile this game, but I am working on getting it compilable on an open source compiler like OpenWatcom 

Enjoy and Be Excellent to Each Other!
